thread.title_full: Point A hotel Liverpool Street - Review of Point A Hotel, London Liverpool Street, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LawrieChris
title: Point A hotel Liverpool Street - Review
text:
Excellent modern facilities. Great value for money. The staff were efficient and helpful. Good WiFi and great information on in room TV. Very clean.
Personally I would have preferred two pillows especially for watching tv while resting but a minor point. Also there is a very good pub next door with good food.
